name: Wedding website
title: SPA
description2: It includes information about the wedding, carousel galery, contact formulary, location link and a countdown timer.

name: Malaga Challenge
title: Landing page
description: Finalist project in the hackathon of Malaga Tourism Challenge 2020.
description2: Minimalist landing page where you can see the teaser of the campaign and the main characters.

name: Rick & Morty
title: Character finder
description: Character Finder from the TV show Rick & Morty.
description2: A funny way to filter the characters obtained from an api.

name: Mother of Components
title: Card generator
description: Card generator wiht dark mode inspired by Game of Thrones.
description2: Personalize your card with colors, photo, pictures and your personal data through an interactive form. Also you can share the card in Twitter!

name: Emparejados
title: Cards memory game
description: Memory game based on matching cards.
description2: Choose the level of difficulty and the topic theme. You also have a chronometer and a panel with the score.

name: Coronavirus TV
title: TV shows finder
description: TV shows finder generated with the data of an api.
description2: Offers the functionality to save and delete favourites and search shows by characters.
